H3.text: how tall is the tallest building in las vegas. 1,149 feet

A4.text: It is 1,149 ft (350.2 m) observation tower, the tallest in the United States.

A5.text: Because the tower is not fully habitable, it is not considered a building, according to the Council on Tall Buildings and Urban Habitat.

A6.text: The tallest building in the state is the Fontainebleau Las Vegas, with a height of 737 feet (225 m).

A7.text: Freestanding observation towers, while not habitable buildings, are included for comparison purposes but not ranked.

A8.text: Since its topping out in 2013, One World Trade Center in New York City has been the tallest skyscraper in the United States.
